events: Patrol report of dense pine growth obstructing visibility
Noticing faint smoke residue near the ridge
Suspicious individuals avoiding the main trail
Normal movement observed along tourist road
text_data.movement_direction: From Pahalgam Town to Baisaran Entry Gate

historical_context:
[Ref: latesttext2.txt]: Patrol Report 11 – ROMEO Team (Terrain Issue + Line-of-Sight Problems)
Team ID: PT-ROMEO
Base: Pahalgam CRPF Camp
Time: 21 April, 1:00 PM – 2:40 PM
Zone: Baisaran Upper Meadow → North Forest Slope
“Baisaran upper slope heavily obstructed by dense pine growth.
Even at 30–40 meters visibility drops drastically.
We noticed faint smoke residue near the ridge but no direct sightline due to slope geometry.
Team could not verify if it was a cooking fire or hostile movement.”

[Ref: latest.txt]: Patrol Team Report #1 — ALPHA-21 (Morning Patrol)
Team ID: PT-ALPHA-21
Base: CRPF Camp Pahalgam
Patrol Zone: Pahalgam Town → Baisaran Entry Gate → Trail-1
Time: 22 April 2025, 08:40 AM – 11:05 AM
“Normal movement observed along tourist road.
At 10:12 AM, two individuals seen near Forest Shadow Zone (low signal area).
They avoided the main trail when patrol approached.

summary: Patrol teams ROMEO and ALPHA-21 report terrain issues, line-of-sight problems, and suspicious movements in the Baisaran area
